data.eml:eml: The lysianassid genus Pseudambasia in Australian waters (Crustacea, Amphipoda, Lysianassidae, Lysianassinae)

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Kilgallen, N. M., Lowry, J. K. (2013): The lysianassid genus Pseudambasia in Australian waters (Crustacea, Amphipoda, Lysianassidae, Lysianassinae). Zootaxa 3710 (4): 301-321, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.3710.4.1
